children.title: 比分页面-简约卡片.html
children.summary: This is a sports scores page displaying live matches, today's schedule, hot matches, and quick odds with navigation to different sections, allowing users to filter and view detailed information about various sports events.
children.path: workspace/paraflow/Screen & Prototype/比分页面-简约卡片.html

children.title: 比分页面-渐变活力.html
children.summary: This is a sports score page displaying live matches, today's schedule, and popular matches with navigation to different sections at the bottom.
children.path: workspace/paraflow/Screen & Prototype/比分页面-渐变活力.html

children.title: 我的页面.html
children.summary: This is a user profile page displaying profile information, settings, content, and app information with navigation to different sections.

children.title: 赛程页面.html
children.summary: This is a sports schedule page displaying a calendar, leagues, today's matches, and user alerts with navigation to different sections.

children.title: 关注页面.html
children.summary: This is a sports following page displaying live scores, upcoming matches, and team information with navigation to different sections, including scores, schedules, and user profiles.

children.title: 赔率页面.html
children.summary: This is an odds page displaying sports betting information, including trending matches, odds, and schedules, with filters for sports and timeframes, as well as a watchlist for monitoring specific matches.

children.title: 比赛详情页面.html
children.summary: This is a live sports match page displaying the current score, match statistics, live events, lineups, and betting odds for a football match between Manchester United and Arsenal, with navigation to different sections.

children.title: 比分页面-专业深色.html
children.summary: This is a live sports score page displaying current match scores, schedules, and trending matches with navigation to different sections.
children.path: workspace/paraflow/Screen & Prototype/比分页面-专业深色.html

children.title: persona_casual_fan.md
children.summary: 介绍"社交观赛者"用户晓雨，一个热爱社交、希望快速了解热门体育赛事的年轻人，需求简单高效的用户体验。

children.title: persona_serious_fan.md
children.summary: 介绍“数据分析师”核心用户，重点介绍体育记者Carlos的需求和行为特征，以满足其对准确、及时的数据分析和报告的需求。

children.title: product_charter.md
children.summary: SportScore 致力于成为用户获取体育赛事数据的首选平台，提供实时、专业、便捷、全面和个性化的体育信息服务。

children.title: SportScore Zen.style-guide.md
children.summary: The SportScore Zen Style Guide outlines design principles, including colors, typography, layout, and assets, to create a visually pure and distraction-free sports viewing experience.

children.title: SportScore专业深色.style-guide.md
children.summary: 该风格指南是为体育数据应用设计的，定义了专业的深色主题，包括主色橙色、深灰背景和清晰的数据展示规范。

children.title: 渐变活力.style-guide.md
children.summary: This document outlines the design guidelines for Soft Float, including color palette, typography, layout, and component examples, to ensure a consistent and visually appealing user interface.

children.title: 赔率_screen_plan.md
children.summary: 为用户提供实时比赛赔率信息，包括热门比赛、即将开始比赛和赔率变化监控。

children.title: prd.md
children.summary: SportScore移动端应用的首个核心版本，旨在为用户提供最及时、全面的体育赛事信息，解决当前碎片化和低效率的问题。

children.title: user_flow.md
children.summary: SportScore的用户流程，包括主页、赛程、关注、赔率和个人中心等导航和核心页面的交互。

children.title: 比赛详情_screen_plan.md
children.summary: 提供单场比赛的全面信息，包括实时比分、统计数据、事件时间线、深度分析和赔率信息。

children.title: 比分_screen_plan.md
children.summary: 本页面设计用于显示实时比分、赛程安排、热门比赛推荐和快速赔率信息，提供给用户便捷的比赛信息查询服务。

children.title: 赛程_screen_plan.md
children.summary: 赛程页面帮助用户查看和管理比赛日程，包括日期导航、赛程列表、联赛筛选和个人赛程管理。

children.title: 我的_screen_plan.md
children.summary: 我的页面是一个用户个人中心，用于管理账户设置、应用偏好和个人数据。

children.title: 关注_screen_plan.md
children.summary: 用户可以管理关注的球队、联赛和比赛，获取个性化的体育资讯、比赛更新和推荐。
